Blockade(String, Player, ArrayList<Player>, ArrayList<Continent>) - Static method in class Tools.PlayersGameplay
This method is used to make a country neutral and increase its army count once the player uses blockade card.

This method is used to test if we can use blockade without given country.

This method is used to test that blockade works successfully.

This method is used to bomb one country when the other player uses the bomb card.

This method is used to test that bomb doesn't work when countries are not neighbours..
